name: Oh My Ballz
description:
Run, gun and match- Gun Chain is an action based puzzle shooter. Quickly destroy balls by making matches of three or more. Each level has different layout and as you acquire new weapons you will have to adopt new strategies to prevail.

Features

  • 7 Unique themed worlds each with several levels
  • 5 Unlockable weapons
  • Multiphase boss battles
  • VR Support (but not required)
  • Twitch streaming features (Play with chat!)
